content: Export to OSV v1.0 is now live: https://github.com/rustsec/advisory-db
an alternative to that branch would be having the web site generator also do OSV export, then the JSON would be available under https://rustsec.org

https://osv.dev/ pulls from git, and this allows efficient sync too. There is a query API on osv.dev for individual JSONs, so I'm not sure we have to duplicate that. I'd suggest waiting for a feature request.
